kb3.name: kb3_log
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_log` ( `log_kll_id` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `log_site` char(20) NOT NULL, `log_ip_address` VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, `log_timestamp` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', UNIQUE KEY `log_kll_id` (`log_kll_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
